Hey there! You are doing pretty good! You got a good medal on you!
What? Why would I talk to you? You've got no medals. Feh!
Sure. See you. Good luck! You're great!
That's right, goodbye. As if I've got time for no-medals like you. Beat it.
A newcomer wants to know about the fighters? HA! Like it matters! You'd have to beat the mighty Hrusk before you're even ranked!
Hrusk has a fine pet, and he's got that flaming axe, you know? Burn the hair right off you, it would. Even the short stuff!
Go away. I'm done talking to your worthless butt.
I can't believe I'm talking to you. I mean, sure, maybe you used to be a no-medals, but look at you now! WOW!
Thanks! <He/She> said thanks! To me! Everyone see that?! Damn right!
I can't believe it! <CUSTOM710> is just the best! The BEST! That was great!
Hmph... wins a few medals and gets all tight... but WOW, that <FullName> can fight! Did you see <him/her> brush me off? ME!
Claudus? He's just great! It's like... I don't know! It's like he's almost invulnerable! Some people complain that he's so good, but they just can't compete.
I mean, everything is fair, right? His pets are normal, like everyone elses, and he doesn't use any magic weapons or anything. He just seems like a super fighter!
Agar is the Third Round Medal fight. He's real tough, got a nice pet, and he's got something nasty too.
Fashi is the Second Round Medal fight. He looks small but boy, he can sure take it. It's amazing, it is.
Oh, sure. I mean, each guy has a specialty, but that's all known before a fight begins, if you ask around.
Except for Claudus. He's got no special thing, but he seems super-tough anyway. He's just that good.
His weapon poisons. People complained at first, but they got used to it. He's just tough anyway, so he's proved his worth.
You just can't cut him or poke him. He's so focussed. He bruises though. I noticed that. He's not invulnerable.
Don't worry about that. You won't get to him. The others are plenty tough, but Claudus is just plain scary.
Made a showing for yourself downstairs, eh? Never make Champion. Not a chance. No way.
I knew it! I knew you could do it! Gots yourself a Champion Medal! Ask around and they'll tell you I knew you could do it!
Get on with you. I got no reason to talk with you.
First Rule of the Gauntlet: Don't shoot the food.
Good on you, boss, showing these rabble they could be beat. Not great for business, but worth it to see them get fed their boots.
You'll want to take that there pass to the bartender. He'll set you up. That's all I'm saying.
The bartender will take your order. I'm busy.
Goodbye for now.
What is your job? Do you fight?
I will fight for my first medal.
I'm ready to try for the next medal round.
Me fight for first medal!
What you do? You fight?
Me leave for now, okay?
What are the rules?
What rules is for fight?
Me ready to try for next medal up thing!
Why is he unbeatable?
Why he so tough?
You will keep the battle fair, won't you?
You keeps it fair though, right?
Bring him on!
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> It should be fair. You know that.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> You should make it fair. That only right.
Do we let him give humans a bad name?
We not let hims give humans shame.
I can pay you. 400 gold will get you away.
Me pay you 400 gold so you free to leave.
You've already been paid to keep it fair.
You already paid to make fair fight.
He is still giving humans a bad name.
He still shame humans.
No, no, I am the healer and a referee, of sorts. I make sure no one actually dies - well, animals or henchmen companions will - and I make sure the fights are fair.
Very well. You will be fighting Hrusk. There is a lever in the pit you can use to exit when you have won, or if you want to give up. Good luck.
I am sorry, someone is already fighting Hrusk for the First Round Medal. Come back in a little while.
Welcome to the Gauntlet. I am the healer and will tend to your wounds if you need me to do so. You know the rules of the pit, I believe?
Prepare. Fashi has readied himself and awaits you.
Ready yourself. Agar awaits in the Pit.
So, you are going to fight Claudus. I wish you the best of luck. He has all the odds on his side.
I am sorry, Fashi has already been challenged. You will have to wait to attempt this round.
I am sorry, Agar is already in battle. You will have to wait if you want to challenge him.
I am sorry, but Claudus is already in battle. You will have to wait to challenge him, unless he is defeated.
So, Claudus finally falls. Good. I was sick of listening to him. Didn't pay me enough to cover his lies forever.
As you will. The fighters will wait for another challenger.
The rules are simple. It is you and your resources against the gladiator and his resources. You are allowed a henchman and perhaps an animal companion, and your opponent will have assistance as well.
You fight until you defeat all your opponents. Anything goes in the pit, but no advance spells or potions can be in effect. All combatants have Dispel Magic cast on them at entry.
There are no prizes, but Claudus has put the Board Laid Bare up as a reward for anyone that can beat him in battle. No one has managed yet.
I try to, anyway. A friendly word of advice? Ask around about the fighters before you fight. That's all I'll say.
That is a discussion we can have when you fight him. Until then, you just leave it alone.
I have the power to do so, but I am... restricted, a little in this instance. Claudus pays for all of this, you understand. You... understand?
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> It's a risk for me... but I suppose... I suppose I should do my job for a change. You're right...
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> You do not understand the place I am in. I wish I could help, but I can't. You will just have to try.
Very well. Prepare to face him. I will make sure a Dispel Magic is cast on you both. Do not waste this chance.
I'm sorry. I took the gold once, but he'll suspect something if I keep doing this... I'm sorry.
No... no we shouldn't. I know... Okay, I will try and keep it fair. I just hope he doesn't notice.
I know but... he's going to notice. I just know it. I'm sorry, I can't keep doing this.
Perhaps... but this doesn't make me feel any more honest. But the money could help me...
I want to ask you some questions.
Me want some informations.
Goodbye.
What do you know of the plague?
Where can I go to get some action?
Aribeth tolerates mercenaries when Neverwinter has a standing militia?
You know anything about the bad plague?
Me wants fighting action somewheres.
Me thought Neverwinter had militia army. Why Aribeth allow mercenaries?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> You can tell me. I'm up for it.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me good for it! Come on!
Come now, there shouldn't be secrets among <race> kind.
You keep secret from <race> buddy? Come on!
Tell me or I will get violent!
You say or me get angry!
Here's my 50 gold.
Me take it. Here 50 gold things.
No thanks.
Not for me, okay?
Here there, friend. I suppose I got time to chat. Trade o' Blades ain't very busy today, and I'm gettin' nowhere with this waitress.
What does you want, ha? Come on, you don't interrupt a Trade of Blades merc without good reason.
This better be good. I've got a fine drink going and that waitress is makin' eyes much prettier than yers.
By the hells, you're dumb as a post! No worries, I suppose. Brains can hold you back in this business.
I suppose. Make it quick, though. I have ever so many places to be. Yeah, right.
I know a sword can't stop it, and that makes me worthless right now. No one is hiring, except the odd noble trying to prevent looting.
Get on, then. I've drinking to get to.
Heh, now you're talking my language. There's one place... hmm...
Just because we work for the highest bidder, doesn't mean we wouldn't put it on the line for this city.
Watch your mouth, friend. It hasn't gone unnoticed that when a few of the city guards died, she hired outsiders like you instead of coming here.
Yeah, you look good with a weapon. Just don't let anyone hear about it. It's not supposed to get around.
I don't know. This place is pretty much just for weapon fighting. No fancy stuff, just straight out brawling.
It's a club for fighting. We call it the Gauntlet. If you want action, that's where you go. I can sell you a pass, if you want. 50 gold.
<StartCheck>[Success]</Start> Ah, fine. Ain't no big thing. If you're not good enough, you get beat down anyway. Just don't blab about it.
<StartCheck>[Failure]</Start> No, it's better if I don't say anything. There's a rule about the Gauntlet. I forget what it is, though, because nobody talks about it.
There was the Gauntlet, but that was won just recently by someone. Ain't nothing there now.
I was gonna say the Gauntlet, but you got the fourth round medal on you right now! That's it for you, friend. You're at the top.
I suppose it's all right. Just don't let on it was me that said. It's not supposed to get around all that much.
Would I be a mercenary if I scared that easy? Right. Just back away, friend. You don't want trouble here.
Suit yourself. No skin off my butt.
But you know all this. I see you've got a pass for the Gauntlet in the Board Laid Bare tavern already. It's in the Blacklake district.
You can get in with that just fine. Give it to the bartender. Just don't make trouble. It ain't exactly legal.
And here's your pass. Don't say where you got it, although I doubt they'll ask. Nobody talks about the Gauntlet, but people show up anyway.
The Board Laid Bare tavern is in the Blacklake district. Give the pass to the bartender. Good luck. You'll need it.
I want to ask you some questions.
Me want some informations.
Goodbye.
What do you know of the plague?
I'm looking for premium equipment.
Have you heard of anything odd? Any rumors?
You know anything about the bad plague?
Me wants real good stuff. Real shiny.
Maybe you hear about odd stuff or rumors?
Let's see what you have for sale.
Show what yous got.
Hello there, then. What can the Shining Knight Arms do for someone so obviously well taken care of?
Yes? Is there something you need? The Shining Knight has what you need.
Yeah? What? Come on, come on, the Shining Knight is a business, not a charity. Let's see your gold.
Well, get the cobwebs out of your head and spill it.
I'm just a merchant. What it is you want me to say?
It's cut into my sales, that's what I know, and my supplies are running out. My blacksmith Marrok has had to offer his services at barely above the cost of materials.
Always open if you've got the gold.
Hmm... Not sure what you're after, really. My stock is the best you'll find for honest coin.
I don't have time for rumors. I guard the shop from looters and plague-sick. That's all that matters.
You look like you really know your way around a weapon. Maybe... yeah, what the hell. I got something special for you.
Of course, it's not like you'd really know. I mean, I might have a special store of things for a true fighting <man/woman>, but you ain't one.
I mean, you've already got a ward for the back room. That's where Marrok makes the good stuff. He'll set you up.
Take this ward stone. It will get you into the back room. There's where Marrok makes the good stuff. He'll take care of you.
I mean, you're not really the type that would know decent weapons and armor... wait a minute... is that a fourth round club medal... ?
I'm sorry, I didn't mean to insult you. If you have that, you deserve the best. Take this ward for the backroom. Marrok will get you the good stuff.
I mean, I see you have a fourth round club medal there, but I already gave a ward to someone that had one.
There can't be two of you, you know. No, I don't think there can. I can't help you.
Nothing that would be worth telling to you. I mean, what are you, smart as a cow? I like you fine, but you is stupid, <man/woman>.
What exactly is it you do here?
I want you to make an item for me.
Here is your <CUSTOM777> gold.
I cannot afford this item.
I'm interested in axes and armor.
I'm interested in blunt and crushing weapons.
I'm interested in magical swords.
I'm interested in some of the less common weapons.
Nevermind, I don't want you to make the item.
Me get it. Here be <CUSTOM777> gold. You work now.
Me not got enough gold.
Me not want item now.
What kinds of things would 'component' items be?
Me want axes and armor.
Me want blunt and smashing weapons.
Me want magic sword.
Me want rare weapon.
What you mean 'component'?
I'm not interested right now.
No bother. Me not want do this now.
Can I ask you some questions, Marrok?
I'll be going now.
What you do here, dwarf man?
Me want you make magic stuff!
Me want ask questions.
Me go now.

I'm not interested in any of these items.
Me no want these items.

Ravager Halberd: Requires dragon blood and a magic halberd.
Sword Saint Katana: Requires adamantite and a magic katana.
Namarra Rapier: Requires dragon blood and a magic rapier.
Desert Wind Scimitar: Requires adamantite and a magic scimitar.

Do you have examples? Give me some idea of what you need.
You got examples, maybe? Give a clue what you need.
Where can I get some of these components?
Where me get component stuff like that?
Is the item guaranteed to be powerful?
You always get better item back?
Okay, back to my questions about what you can make.
Back to questions about stuff you make, okay?
Back to my questions about components
Back to stuff about components, okay?
Well now, you might know your way around a fine weapon or two, eh? What can Marrok do for you?
Okay, I see there's some stuff on my anvil. Let me take a look and see what I can construct for you.
Nope, this won't do. Listen closely - there can only be two items on the forge: one component item and a specific magical weapon or suit of magic armor that goes with it.
Let's see... you have a diamond and a suit of magical armor. I could build you a Chromatic Breastplate - a fine suit of armor if I do say so myself.
But this job isn't cheap. It will cost <CUSTOM777> gold pieces for me to make this for you. Payment in advance, of course.
Always a pleasure doing business with a fine <man/woman> such as yourself. Stand back - you don't want to catch a hammer in the head.
What is that? Some special holy water? Powerful stuff. I could combine it with your suit of magical armor and make you a Scales of Truth suit.
If you want I can look through your inventory and backpack to see if you have anything I can combine into a powerful weapon or suit of armor. Is there anything in particular you want me to look for?
So, axes and armor is it? Let me just take a look at what you've got in that pack of yours and I'll give you a list of what I can make from your inventory.
Of course. Not everybody's into axes, swords and maces now, are they? Let me give you a list of the exotic weapons I can make with the items in your pack.
Hmmm... I could combine that gargoyle skull and your suit of magical armor into a top of the line suit of Whitebone Armor.
That adamantite could be worked into that magic battleaxe to make a Sentinel. Fine weapon. Mighty fine weapon.
Ironwood. You know, I could combine the ironwood with that magic club of yours and make you a Gladiator's club.
Clubs, maces and hammers for you, eh? I'll just take a look at your stuff and see what we've got to work with, then I'll give you a list of the items I can make for you.
There you go, <sir/madam>. Quick as you please and the job is done. You can pick the item up from my forge.
Fair enough - but this isn't a charity I'm running. If you don't have the gold, you don't get the item. Anything else I can do for you?
Fair enough - a customer always has the right to change <his/her> mind. Anythinge else I can do for you?
Okay, I know you aren't too bright so I'll speak nice and slow. It will cost <CUSTOM777> gold pieces for me to make this for you. Payment in advance, of course. Do you understand?
Just place one component item and one magical weapon or one suit of magic armor on the forge and I'll help you out. But if the forge isn't full - like now - I can't really do my thing, can I?
Interesting. Ironwood would graft quite nicely to that magical mace to make a solid Ironwood Mace.
Hmmm... I could bond the adamantite to that magic double axe and make you a Double Axe of the Tall Kin.
This will work. I can combine your adamantite with your magic great axe to make a Stonefire Great Axe.
Ah... there's real potential here. Your adamantite and your magic greatsword will make a Harbinger Kin Greatsword.
Huh. Dragon blood. Not going to ask where you got that, but I can use it to turn that magic halberd into a Ravager Halberd.
Dragon blood is powerful stuff. If I remember right I could combine it with that magic hand axe and make an Ice Reaver Hand Axe.
That dragon blood will go nicely with your magic heavy flail to make a Reaver Heavy Flail.
Okay, here's something. I can use your adamantite and your magic katana to make a Sword Saint Katana.
This is interesting. By adding your diamond to your magic longsword I can make an Astral Blade Longsword.
You know, that diamond could be added to your magic light hammer to make a Storm Light Hammer.
I could work that ironwood into your magic light flail to make a Foundation Light Flail.
Aha - jackpot! I can use your special holy water and your magic mace to create a Mace of Disruption!
Look at that - fairy dust! I could combine it with your magic morning star to construct a Drone Morning Star.
I could use that dragon blood and your magic rapier to make a Namarra Rapier.
I could forge that adamantite with that magic scimitar and make you a Desert Wind Scimitar.
If I remember right, the adamantite can be added to your magic scythe to make a Sea Reaver Scythe.
You know, I could use that fairy dust and your magic short sword to make you a Feyduster short sword.
Hmmm... that fairy dust will work into your magic spear. I could make a Fey Spear, if you want.
Hey, look at this! I can use this special holy water and your magic sickle to make a Golden Sickle.
I bet if I take that ironwood and that two-bladed sword I can create one of those Uthgardt Ceremonial Two-Bladed Swords.
Okay - I can take your adamantite and your magic war hammer make you a Rune Hammer.
I'm a weapon and armor smith, of sorts. I take component items and combine them with magic items to make even more powerful magic items. Not a bad little gig, if you can get it.
Nothing beats a good old sword, does it? Tried and true. Okay, let me peek inside your backpack and I'll give you a list of the wondrous blades I can make from the stuff in your inventory.
Well, I need stuff like Adamantine and Ironwood and Diamonds and Dragon Blood and Fairy Dust (SPIT!!) and Holy Water and Gargoyle Skulls and... and... Adamantine...
Hey, I'm not trying to pressure you. I've got enough business as it is. Anything else I can do for you?
Goodbye. Perhaps we'll talk another time.
Bah! Ask your questions but make it quick. I don't have time waste on pleasantries. I have important work to do.

You'll have to remove the items from my forge and put the proper component item and an appropriate magic item in place if you want me to make anything for you. Now, is there anything else I can do for you?
If an item isn't on the list, you don't have the stuff I need to make it. Just pick something you're interested in having me make.
Hmmm... you don't seem to have the stuff I need to make a special axe or special armor. Is there anything else I can do for you?
Excellent choice. When you're ready, just place the component and appropriate magic item on the forge then come speak to me again.
Just say you want me to create an item for you, and if everything is in the forge as it should be we can do business.
If an item isn't on the list, you don't have the stuff I need to make it. Just pick something you're interested in having me make.
Hmmm... you don't seem to have the stuff I need to make a special blunt or crushing weapon. Is there anything else I can do for you?
Hmmm... you don't seem to have the items I need to make a special sword of any type. Is there anything else I can do for you?
If an item isn't on the list, you don't have the stuff I need to make it. Just pick something you're interested in having me make.
Hmmm... you don't seem to have the items I need to make a special rare or exotic weapon. Is there anything else I can do for you?
If an item isn't on the list, you don't have the stuff I need to make it. Just pick something you're interested in having me make.
Yes? What? Marrok is busy busy here.
By the hells, Durga be letting the worst rabble in here! What you want from Marrok, what, what!?
No, no, no, you sneak in here! You are no fighter type, I can see that plain! Get you gone from here! MY WORK IS NOT FOR AMATEURS!
Then I take a magic version of the item you want made, and combine the things to make something different.
Eh, no. See, If your weapon or armor is really powerful already, you should keep it. Just give me your low-level magic items. I can't guarantee that your fancy item won't get worse.
That ain't my concern. If you're the adventuring sort, you can go try and take them from monsters. I think you can get some from merchants, though.
Eh, I suppose. I don't like tipping my hand all that much, but I can't sell it if you don't know about it. Here, take a copy of this book. It's got all you need to know.
Citizen, you should speak to me before going through this gate.

Relax, I'm not here to hurt you.
Me not hurt you.
Who said I was here because of Ophala? Who is that?
Did me say Ophala? Didn't think so. Who she?
Your valuables!! Where are they !!! NOW!!!
Where your valuable stuffs! WHERE?!!
I'm going now.
Me go now.
Yes, I'm here because of Ophala, just like you said.
Yeah, me here because of Ophala, just like you say.
Where is this statue she wants? Why is it important?
Where this statue she want? Why it needed?
I swear she didn't send me here.
Me swear she not send me.
What? Who... ? Ruffian! Please, get away!
No! Please! Whatever you're here for, just take it and go! Tell Mistress Ophala that I'm sorry I caused her distress! I'm sorry!
You've opened my doors, sullied my home, and you're probably rife with plague! You've already hurt me! All for that blasted statue!
Everywhere! It's my home! There's a key around here somewhere! It opens everything! JUST DON'T TOUCH ME!!!
Don't lie to me! I know! She's wanted that statue for years, and now you show up here, a thug in my home! Of course she sent you!
Take what you want. Just don't hurt me. I don't want anyone here, and I sure don't want Ophala breathing down my neck anymore!
Of course you are! I wouldn't believe you if you said you weren't. She's wanted that statue for years, and now you show up here, a thug in my home!
So don't play dumb or cute, I know what this is about. Tell her I'm sorry, and that I won't bother her again! Take the damned statue and just get out!
It doesn't matter. You're either here for the statue or you're a thief and you'll take it anyway. Either way, I don't have to deal with it anymore.
If she didn't send you, I'll pay dearly for saying anything. If she did send you, she'd have told you if you were supposed to know.
Suffice it to say that if you take the matron of the Moonstone Mask to a ball, make sure you don't leave with her sister.
No amount of tributary artwork will save your hide from her wrath. Just take it. The statue is in my dresser, along with a master key for most of my locks.
There's a key around here somewhere that will unlock everything... or just smash it all, I don't care. Just don't touch me!
Grovelling won't save your worthless hide! Die, scum!
If you want to live, you'd better answer my questions!
You beg but me still kill you! You die now!
You answer me question, me let you live... maybe.
Go on, get out of here before I slit your throat!
You run away now or me change mind and kill you!
I think I've decided to kill you after all.
Me kill you after all, yuh?
I don't want this to turn ugly... but you're not leaving me much choice.
You talk or me get mad! You no want me get mad!
Your life is in my hands - you'd better not keep secrets.
You life in me hands - you no keep secret.
Either you start talking or I start removing your fingers!
You talk or me hack off you fingers!
<StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> Is it the cause or your pay that you don't want to risk?
Who do you work for?
Who you work for?
Please... my death will serve no purpose. Allow me to live...
You will get nothing from me. Come kill me, then! I will die for a greater cause than you can know!
There is nothing I can tell you. I am sworn to my cause. I would plead for my life, but I will only come back if released.
I can fight no more... I am beaten...
Your mercy is admirable... but it will not endear me to you. I am sworn to the inevitable. Neverwinter will fall to plague, and what comes after... you cannot know.
I can make no good argument for why you should spare me. I can't tell you what you want to know. I will not risk endangering what must come!
Your hands? The lives of all the plague-dead trickle though your hands second by second. Do not think you control anything by threatening my little life. I am nothing compared to what comes!
That is not for you to know. I cannot tell you - you would not understand what must be done.
You know nothing! My cause is beyond you! My payment is to stand strong while the rest of you fall to plague!
Kill the enemy!
We cannot fail in our task!
I don't bargain with the devil's own. To arms!
I've got plenty of questions. You'd better damn well have answers...
You beg but me still kill you! You die now!
You answer me questions, me let you live... maybe.
Where can I find him, then?
Where me find him, den?
Go tell your precious Master that he's messing with the wrong <man/woman>.
You tell Master guy he pick on wrong <man/woman>.
I grow weary of you. Prepare to die...
Me bored wit' you. You die now...
With the Waterdhavian creatures we will soon have a cure. The plague will be beaten.
Me collects Water-whosis creatures. We gonna gets cure soon so yous gonna fail.
Either you start talking or I start removing your fingers...
You talk or me hack off fingers...
<StartCheck>[Insight]</Start> Are your people immune to the plague... or do you simply know how it is spread?
Who is this Master of yours?
Is your life so worthless you will not bargain for it?
Who dis Master guy be?
You not want to bargain for yous life? You that worthless?
You are stronger than I expected... a pity you will not survive. I'm certain the master would've preferred that you serve him.
Kill me if you must, but you cannot stop what comes! The People of the Eye serve the inevitable! You will wish you had never existed!
My life has already been given to another. Even if I die, I have already served a greater destiny than you can even comprehend.
Stay your wrath... this battle is lost to me... I yield.
As you wish, my <lord/lady>... but I'm sure the Wailing shall have its way with you long before my Master ever needs to intervene.
Ah, but you already have. The only reason you cannot see him is that he does not try to hide.
You are a fool. The plague points to a great and glorious future, and we have ensured that it did what it must! Your actions only ensure a more painful death for yourself!
My life is far from meaningless. I serve a cause that is far greater than anything you can fathom. I walk strong among the plague-ridden knowing you can do nothing to stop it.
His name is not for me to reveal. Perhaps once the Wailing has run its course, he shall spell it out in corpses down the avenues.
There is little I can do to stay your wrath, but it doesn't matter. My death will mean nothing to you, and less to the inevitable will of my masters.
We walk ahead of the plague. It is the tool of far greater masters than you can comprehend. It will take you. You will rot and fall away, and in the end your death will be a blessing.
You will be stopped. You will take no more steps toward a cure. My master has declared that there shall be no salvation for this wretched city. It will wither and die...
You are an annoyance to the master, but he knows all that you do... all the steps you make. You will be shrugged aside in the end.
I did not say I was sent by Ophala.
Me say nothing about Ophala.
Sit your pathetic self down or I will hurt you!
Shut up or me kill you dead!
Rest easy. I am leaving.
Me leave. You no worry.
You'd better hope you remember! Face me!
You better get better! Fights me now!
That's right. Stay there and no one gets hurt.
You stay put like rock and me not hurt!
Who are you, you little blighter?! Speak! Or I will call the guards to remove you!
By what right do you enter my home! Did Ophala put you up to this?! I demand to know!
Worry? Why should I worry! You are obviously a scoundrel with no true backbone! Guards! Dispatch this worm!
Eh... n-now then, there's no c-call for that kind of talk. I didn't mean to threaten you... Just thought I'd try the old school discipline... eh? Yes...
Oh, but who else would put you up to this, hmm? Well if she wants that portrait, she should send real fighting men to get it!
Obviously Ophala means business... she s-sent capable muscle... Take what you want... I'm not the fighter I once was...
*Sigh* Not like the old days... J-just don't hurt me...
What? Only a dog doesn't respect surrender! Guards! Help!
Take what you will... This old man can't stop you... Damn that Ophala...
I am no concern of yours. Walk away.
You turn around and leave!
Shut your mouth and be quiet or I kill you!
Shut up or me kill!
Relax, I won't hurt you.
Me not hurt you.
Callers for the master don't arrive like this! Your finery is betrayed! Are you bandit?!
I'm waiting for an answer. What are you doing in my kitchen! Probably a bandit!
Vermin in my kitchen. What mangey dog choked you up? Hmm? Bandit! Thief!
What are you doing in my kitchen?! Speak up, or I call the guards!
Save your words. You'll get nothing from me. If you are looking for Master Hodge, he's already gone. You'd think the bugger knew someone was coming.
He's taken his master keys with him. I couldn't help you if I wanted, which I don't. I don't get involved in the affairs of Master Hodge. I don't need the grief.
If you share a relationship with him, I don't know which of you is worse off. Now get! My muffins are burning!
Oh no, you aren't going to try those excuses on me. I gave a warning once, and now I'm through! GUARDS!
I have recovered one of the reagents for the cure.

I need to talk to you.
I came as quickly as I could, Lady Aribeth.

You were waiting for me? Why?
I'm here now. Say what you have to say.

Fenthick want talk at me first.
Why you wait for me?
Me here now. You speak.
It will be an honor to serve you, Lady Aribeth!
I serve no master but myself!
I'll help you... for a price.
Me be honored for serve you, Aribeth!
Me serve no one but me!
Me help you... if you give gold!
I have heard such rumors before.
What became of these creatures?
Time's wasting. Get to the point, Aribeth.
Me heard that before.
What happen to magic monsters?
You boring. Hurry up.

So you think someone within the Academy betrayed you.
But Academy got attacked.
Me not understand - you say Academy betray you?
How may I serve you in this, Lady Aribeth?
Let me guess, you want me to get those creatures back.
What you want me do now, Aribeth?
You want me go get monster back for you?
Why did you choose me for this?
Shouldn't the city watch be helping in this?
I will do as you command, Lady Aribeth.
I'll do it, but the rewards better be worthwhile!
Why you pick me?
Why city guards no do this?
Me do as you command, Aribeth.
Me do it, but it better be worth me time!
How do we even know the creatures are still alive?
How you even know monsters still alive?
I will begin my search for the Waterdhavian creatures at once!
I need to ask you some questions.

Tell me about Fenthick.

Now that me is working for you, me want know more 'bout you.
You tell me 'bout Fenthick now, 'kay?
What you think 'bout Desther.
What can you tell me about the attack on the Academy?
I want to know more about the Wailing Death.
I want more information on the Waterdhavian creatures and this cure.
Where can I get some supplies?
What you know 'bout attack on Academy?
Me want know more of plague.
What you know 'bout monsters and cure for sickness?
Me need buy stuff.
Goodbye.
Maybe he has a point.
Maybe him got point.
Why do you put up with him?
Why you keep him here?
I want to ask you about something else.
Me want ask 'bout other stuff.
Do have any information as to where the creatures might be?
You got hints for me 'bout where to look for monsters?
The room next door is full of plague victims. Aren't you scared of being infected?
Did the quarantine do anything to help?
You got sickies in temple here. You not scared?
You block city off, right? No one go in or out?
Tell me about the cockatrice.
Tell me about the yuan-ti.
Tell me about the intellect devourer.
Tell me about the dryad.
What right do you have to use kill these creatures to save yourselves?
You tell 'bout cockatrice.
You tell 'bout yuan-ti.
You tell 'bout intellect devourer.
You tell 'bout dryad.
